front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for the VRRP over IPv4 and IPv6

abstract.t: This specification defines a Management Information Base (MIB) for use with SNMP-based network management. In particular, it defines objects for configuring, monitoring, and controlling routers that employ the Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol for both IPv4 and IPv6 as defined in RFC 3768 and RFC xxxx ( RFC-editor, this is currently draft-ietf-vrrp-ipv6-spec-07.txt). This memo obsoletes RFC 2787.
